scripts.docs: npm run docs:analyze && npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:copy-sources && npm run docs:index && npm run docs:demo && npm run docs:demo-iframe
scripts.docs:copy-sources: cp -r bower_components ./build && mkdir build/vaadin-router && cp -r demo *.html analysis.json build/vaadin-router
scripts.docs:index: cp polymer.json build && cd build && polymer build && mv build/es5-bundled ../docs
scripts.docs:demo: cp demo/polymer.json build && cd build && polymer build && mv build/es5-bundled/vaadin-router/demo ../docs/vaadin-router
scripts.docs:demo-iframe: cp demo/polymer.iframe.json build/polymer.json && cd build && polymer build && mv build/es5-bundled/vaadin-router/demo/vaadin-router-demo-iframe.html ../docs/vaadin-router/demo
